data.name: SOL Cycling Demo
data.detailed_description:
Required: Exercise bike with bluetooth Heart/Power/Speed sensors. An MMO that will have you riding with friends on real Mars terrain thanks to images from NASA. This demo allows you to ride or Run with NASA's Perseverance Rover.


Many months have passed and we lack electricity, water and food. Our fragile colony is crumbling. We were not prepared - we thought we were alone.
The bikes were an obvious solution; they require little resources and are just fast enough to get passed the swarms.
We will work together to take back control of the supply lines.
We will ride to survive...

Gameplay:

An MMO that will have you riding with friends on real Mars terrain thanks to
images from NASA's JPL & UofA. But you are not alone, help secure the
supply lines and deliver the cargo - ride to survive!

  • Buy the game - you get the game (Early Access)
  • No in app purchases
  • No pay to win items

Terrain:

  • Real Mars Terrain
  • 4K Textures
  • Realistic Weather Effects

Rider:

  • Your Real Legs
  • Simulated Mars Physics, such as Gravity & Air Resistance
  • Mechanical Pressure Spandex & Polymer Space Suits

Bike:

  • Nickel-Titanium Shape Memory Wheels
  • Inbuilt Moxie Life Support System
  • Safety Lights and Suspension

data.short_description: Required: Exercise bike with bluetooth Heart/Power/Speed sensors. An MMO that will have you riding with friends on real Mars terrain thanks to images from NASA. This demo allows you to ride or Run with NASA's Perseverance Rover.
data.reviews:
““We have ridden a lot of beta's and they are not playable and not ridable for 1 Hour 20 Minutes on your second ride.””
Team ODZ - JFlo

““It's like a race... a race to... a ramp test!!””
Team ODZ - Waggs

““When you see what the start as the base for the platform, you can see where they could be going with this game - in creative and thoughtful directions.””
Alison K.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: x86
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce series 9 or better
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Stereo Sound
  • Additional Notes: Bluetooth or ANT+ Wireless connectivity to a Exercise bike or a bike with speed sensor.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra
  • Processor: x86
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce series 9 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Stereo Sound
  • Additional Notes: Bluetooth or ANT+ Wireless connectivity to a Exercise bike or a bike with speed sensor.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
